#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

long long dec2bin(long long dec)
{
	long long bin=0;
	long long ten=1;
	while(dec>0)
	{
		bin+=(dec%2)*ten;
		dec/=2;
		ten*=10;
	}
	//	cout<<bin<<endl;
	return bin;
}

long long pent2dec(long long pent)
{
	long long dec=0;
	long long temp=1;
	while(pent>0)
	{
		dec+=(pent%10)*temp;
		temp*=5;
		pent/=10;
	}
	//cout<<dec<<endl;
	return dec;
}



int main()
{
	int t,n,i;
	long long s=0,j=1,a,b;
	cin>>t;
	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
	{
		cin>>n;
		/*while(n>0)
		{
			j*=5;
			if(n&1)
			{
				s+=j;
			}
			n>>=1;
		}*/
		a=dec2bin(n);
		b=pent2dec(a*10);
		cout<<b<<endl;
		//cout<<s<<endl;
		s=0;j=1;
	}
	return 0;
}
